title: Word Document Processing
summary: This notebook processes Word documents using two methods. It loads documents using Docx2txtLoader and UnstructuredWordDocumentLoader. The content and metadata of the loaded documents are displayed.

key_functions.name: Docx2txtLoader
key_functions.takeaway: Loads Word documents into a structured format.

key_functions.name: UnstructuredWordDocumentLoader
key_functions.takeaway: Loads Word documents as unstructured elements.
